snippet: There will be more women than men on the U.S. Olympic team in 2012, a milestone for the Games.
abstract: There will be more women than men on the U.S. Olympic team in 2012, a milestone for the Games.
lead_paragraph: The news that the United States will send more women than men to compete on its Olympic team in London reflects a turnaround in women’s participation in the modern Games that’s evolved over the past century.

headline.main: Women’s Olympic Rise Has Been a Long Time Coming
